title: Ber86
author: Ber86
content: Hello Bitcointalk Community!We're excited to introduce you to our latest venture in the crypto space - a unique opportunity that combines innovation with a solid investment prospect.🌐 **About Us**We are a budding crypto startup with a strong focus on technological advancement in the digital currency world. Our project is backed by a robust and innovative platform, which you can explore through our live demo at [https://adonx.one](https://adonx.one).📈 **Investment Opportunity**We're currently seeking private investors to be a part of our journey. For each investment of $15,000, we're offering **1% equity** along with a reserved portion of tokens allocated for our team. This is a rare chance to be an integral part of a growing startup at an early stage.🔍 **Use of Funds**The raised funds will be strategically utilized for:- Conducting impactful sale campaigns.- Legal registration of the company.- Supporting ongoing operations.📚 **Our Vision and Technology**For a detailed insight into our technology and objectives, we invite you to read our whitepaper: [https://adonx.one/assets/docs/whitepaper.pdf](https://adonx.one/assets/docs/whitepaper.pdf). Here, you'll find comprehensive information about our goals and the innovative solutions we're bringing to the crypto world.📩 **Get in Touch**Interested in this opportunity? For more information or to discuss further, please feel free to contact us right here on Bitcointalk or reach out to @AndrewJesus on Telegram.We're looking forward to potentially partnering with visionary investors like you. Let's drive the future of crypto together!
